Package gui.controllers

Class BasicOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controllers.BasicOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicController
    public abstract class BasicOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class template for controllers. It contains all basic elements other than "@FXML".
    Author:
    Tomasz Strzoda

      • fillTableView

        protected void fillTableView​(java.lang.String[][] solution,
                             javafx.scene.control.TableView tableView,
                             javafx.scene.control.TableColumn[] tableCols)
        This method fills the TableView in which solutions of CLP problems are presented.
        Parameters:
        solution - array of solution.
        tableView - specific TableView to fill.
        tableCols - array of columns.

      • setColumn

        protected void setColumn​(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<java.lang.String[],​java.lang.String> column,
                         int colNo)
        This method is responsible for filling the column of TableView which is the solution of the CLP problem.
        Parameters:
        column - specific column to fill.
        colNo - column number from the TableView.

      • setTimeLabel

        protected void setTimeLabel​(Base activeModule,
                            javafx.scene.text.TextFlow timeLabel)
        This method sets the time label which is the time to look for a solution of the CLP problem.
        Parameters:
        activeModule - type of CLP problem.
        timeLabel - specific label to fill.

      • round

        protected static double round​(double value,
                              int places)
        This method rounds the floating point number (solve time).
        Parameters:
        value - number for rounding.
        places - number of decimal places.
        Returns:
        rounded number.
